sql.where: 1=1 AND order.order_id = #{orderId} AND order.order_no = #{orderNo} AND order.user_id = #{userId} AND order.pdt_id = #{pdtId} AND order.inst_id = #{instId} AND order.order_inst_name = #{orderInst_name} AND order.order_product_name = #{orderProduct_name} AND order.order_product_price = #{orderProduct_price} AND order.order_buycount = #{orderBuycount} AND order.order_amount = #{orderAmount} AND order.order_charge = #{orderCharge} AND order.order_actual_amount = #{orderActual_amount} AND order.order_bail_money = #{orderBail_money} AND order.order_freeze_id = #{orderFreeze_id} AND order.order_unfreeze_id = #{orderUnfreeze_id} AND order.order_confirmtime = #{orderConfirmtime} AND order.order_paytime = #{orderPaytime} AND order.order_collect_no = #{orderCollect_no} AND order.order_pay_no = #{orderPay_no} AND order.order_expire_next_step = #{orderExpire_next_step} AND order.order_remark = #{orderRemark} AND order.order_status = #{orderStatus} AND order.order_createtime = #{orderCreatetime} AND order.order_modifytime = #{orderModifytime}

1=1 AND order_id = #{orderId} AND order_no = #{orderNo} AND user_id = #{userId} AND pdt_id = #{pdtId} AND inst_id = #{instId} AND order_inst_name = #{orderInst_name} AND order_product_name = #{orderProduct_name} AND order_product_price = #{orderProduct_price} AND order_buycount = #{orderBuycount} AND order_amount = #{orderAmount} AND order_charge = #{orderCharge} AND order_actual_amount = #{orderActual_amount} AND order_bail_money = #{orderBail_money} AND order_freeze_id = #{orderFreeze_id} AND order_unfreeze_id = #{orderUnfreeze_id} AND order_confirmtime = #{orderConfirmtime} AND order_paytime = #{orderPaytime} AND order_collect_no = #{orderCollect_no} AND order_pay_no = #{orderPay_no} AND order_expire_next_step = #{orderExpire_next_step} AND order_remark = #{orderRemark} AND order_status = #{orderStatus} AND order_createtime = #{orderCreatetime} AND order_modifytime = #{orderModifytime}

mapper.select: SELECT count(1) AS count FROM dr_order AS order

SELECT order.order_id as orderId, order.order_no as orderNo, order.user_id as userId, order.pdt_id as pdtId, order.inst_id as instId, order.order_inst_name as orderInst_name, order.order_product_name as orderProduct_name, order.order_product_price as orderProduct_price, order.order_buycount as orderBuycount, order.order_amount as orderAmount, order.order_charge as orderCharge, order.order_actual_amount as orderActual_amount, order.order_bail_money as orderBail_money, order.order_freeze_id as orderFreeze_id, order.order_unfreeze_id as orderUnfreeze_id, order.order_confirmtime as orderConfirmtime, order.order_paytime as orderPaytime, order.order_collect_no as orderCollect_no, order.order_pay_no as orderPay_no, order.order_expire_next_step as orderExpire_next_step, order.order_remark as orderRemark, order.order_status as orderStatus, order.order_createtime as orderCreatetime, order.order_modifytime as orderModifytime FROM dr_order AS order WHERE order_id = #{orderId}

SELECT order.order_id as orderId, order.order_no as orderNo, order.user_id as userId, order.pdt_id as pdtId, order.inst_id as instId, order.order_inst_name as orderInst_name, order.order_product_name as orderProduct_name, order.order_product_price as orderProduct_price, order.order_buycount as orderBuycount, order.order_amount as orderAmount, order.order_charge as orderCharge, order.order_actual_amount as orderActual_amount, order.order_bail_money as orderBail_money, order.order_freeze_id as orderFreeze_id, order.order_unfreeze_id as orderUnfreeze_id, order.order_confirmtime as orderConfirmtime, order.order_paytime as orderPaytime, order.order_collect_no as orderCollect_no, order.order_pay_no as orderPay_no, order.order_expire_next_step as orderExpire_next_step, order.order_remark as orderRemark, order.order_status as orderStatus, order.order_createtime as orderCreatetime, order.order_modifytime as orderModifytime FROM dr_order AS order
${orderby}
